remarks: Similar to ~ dvelim with first hypothesis replaced by distinct variable condition.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Jul-2015.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 30-Apr-2018.)
statement:
dvelimv.1 $e |- ( z = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
dvelimv $p |- ( -. A. x x = y -> ( ps -> A. x ps ) ) $.
$d ph x $.
$d ps z $.
